talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>
<html>$Remote quest$</html>
<FONT color=#7e12d2>(Lunaria is staring at you quietly)</FONT></html>

$Shadow Neko$
Dear disciple, where are you looking at?

$Shadow Neko$
That’s right. But you are the only one student I havemeow.
Come heremeow. You look much thinner that before. Tsk-tsk...

$Shadow Neko$
Your master have created a special scroll for you.
(Mumbles) The truth is that I picked it up from somewhere and I’m too scared to use it for myself…

$Shadow Neko$
You're not even a cat but you have such a good sense of hearing. Don't ask me too many questions. Why don't you try meditating with this scroll?
This is the Shadow Neko Meditation Manual!!!.

$Shadow Neko$
If you're interested, I can help you to meditate.
Observing your inner self is the shortcut to becoming stronger. Trust meow.

$Shadow Neko$
Okay then. Come back when you've changed your mind.

$Shadow Neko${action:Stand2}
Oh, made up your mind? Good. A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Let's begin.

$Shadow Neko$
Imagine… In front of you there is a river. Slowly walk to the river and take your shoes off… Look around you… The spring wind is blowing graciously… The sun is setting across a meadow full of flowers…
(Shadow Neko softly chants something like he is putting a spell on you)

$Shadow Neko$
The river tickles your toes… You start to fall asleep…
Deeper… and deeper…

${user_nick}$
(It is getting dark)

$Shadow Neko$
…Hey you can't open your eyes. I think it's because it's too noisy.

(* Specialization quest cannot be taken in a party.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Didn't I go through this before too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Shadow Neko$
If you're interested, I can help you to meditate.
Observing your inner self is the shortcut to becoming stronger. Trust meow.

$Shadow Neko$
Trust me. Close your eyes~ I'll count to three… The birds are flying by...
(Shadow Neko chants like he is putting a spell on yo)

$Shadow Neko$
The wind tickles your ears….You are falling into a small space...
One. Two… Three….

$Shadow Neko${action:Stand2}
Oh, made up your mind? Good. A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Let's begin.

$Shadow Neko$
Imagine… In front of you there is a river. Slowly walk to the river and take your shoes off… Look around you… The spring wind is blowing graciously… The sun is setting across a meadow full of flowers…
(Shadow Neko softly chants something like he is putting a spell on you)

$Shadow Neko$
The river tickles your toes… You start to fall asleep…
Deeper… and deeper…

${user_nick}$
(It is getting dark)

$Shadow Neko$
…Hey you can't open your eyes. I think it's because it's too noisy.

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)

$Illusion$
……Kekekeke.
(Lunaria is staring at you quietly)

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_qu_4355_01.ogg}
This is your inner world.
I am not me.

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_qu_4355_02.ogg}
You're right. I'm but a guide who looks like Lunaria.
I will explain about this place to you now.

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_qu_4355_03.ogg}
This is your inner world. This place is called the Room of Time, and you have to go close to him.
He always tried to get closer to you, so now it's your turn.

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_qu_4355_04.ogg}
He is faster and stronger than you.
If you can prove your strength, you will become closer to him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wait a minute Lunaria... I don't understand anything.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_qu_4355_05.ogg}
…It might seem vague and frustrating. But this is what everyone has went through.
You have to get rid of all your confusion within the time given to you.

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_qu_4355_06.ogg}
...You'll see when you get there. Good luck.
(Your vision starts to blur)

$Illusion$
……Kekekeke.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_01.ogg}
Me?
You know me. You know me for sure.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_02.ogg}
How can you not recognize yourself?
You will know even if you don't want to know. Unless you are a coward who looks away the moment he looks into a mirror.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_03.ogg}
Yes. I am you.
Your future self. But compared to 'now', your past self.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_04.ogg}
It's simple. You could become me about a decade later.
But after I travelled to the past, I lost my physical presence and ended up in your body.
And you were swept away by that woman's powers and jumped across a few decades again...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wait, a few decades?! Are you serious?!!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_05.ogg}
And that is here.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_0.ogg}
Stupid fool.
Weak fool…. You are the fool. A fool who doesn't even understand the situation he is in and the one who can't recognize himself.
(Illusion comes closer)

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_07.ogg}
I shall help you make full use of your weak body.
(A flash of strange light shines in Illusion's eyes)
I'm you anyway. You were going to become me.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_08.ogg}
Why don't you hand over your body?
If not for me, you would have been killed by some low level goblin.
Isn't that so?

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_09.ogg}
I shall help you make full use of your weak body.
(A flash of strange light shines in Illusion's eyes)
(Illusion has an incomprehensible smile on his face)

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_10.ogg}
…Foolish resistance.
You will eventually succumb to me.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_11.ogg}
Lunaria…
…You're being deceived by that woman.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_12.ogg}
The woman will let you choose. She'll say the choice is yours to make.
She has always been like that. That woman will say she will never force you and stay by your side quietly.

$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_13.ogg}
…And eventuatlly… you will become me.
One day you will regret the time you've spent aimlessly. You fool.
An idiot who is being swept around by time.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>(I can't believe that he is me)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Illusion${sound:npc_Illusion_qu_4355_14.ogg}
Kekeke… Try all you can.
I will always be inside you. I'm your future self… I am YOU.
(Illusion's laughter fills the Room of Trial)

${user_nick}$
(I nearly got Lunaria get hurt because my consciousness was taken over by Illusion….
I never want to go through that again.)

${user_nick}$
(I don't want that.
I will see the world with my own eyes and go back to where I belong as myself. I will make the choices.)

$Shadow Neko$
Oh, made up your mind? Good. A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Let's begin.

$Shadow Neko$
Imagine… In front of you there is a river. Slowly walk to the river and take your shoes off… Look around you… The spring wind is blowing graciously… The sun is setting across a meadow full of flowers…
(Shadow Neko softly chants something like he is putting a spell on you)

$Shadow Neko$
The river tickles your toes… You start to fall asleep…
Deeper… and deeper…

$Shadow Neko$
…Hey you can't open your eyes. I think it's because it's too noisy.

(* Specialization quest cannot be taken in a party.)

${user_nick}$
(It is getting dark)

${user_nick}$
(So this Illusion is…)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He said he's me. Did you know about that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lunaria$
So he's inside you again.
Though I don't really care.

$Lunaria$
Oh yeah? It seems a little different but...
Illusion wasn't weak.

$Lunaria$
Maybe it was more comfortable back then.
(Lunaria stares blankly into the air)

$Lunaria$
Maybe.
If you learn the skills that Illusion used, maybe you can.

$Lunaria$
You want me to teach you? I can't remember everything.
Choose one. I'll follow your decision.

* Once selected, the job selection cannot be undone.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Select the job you want to specialize into.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lunaria$
Haven't you decided?
You said you wanted to become stronger.

* Once selected, the job selection cannot be undone.

${user_nick}$
(I'm afraid that becoming as strong as Illusion might turn me into someone like him.
But to protect Lunaria, I need to become stronger. I can't be wrong about this.)

$Lunaria$
Don't think I taught you all these things.
It wasn't me. It's the power of Illusion that your body remembered.

$Lunaria$
You think I taught you all this.
It wasn't me. It's the power of llusion that your body remembered.

${user_nick}$
(I'm afraid that becoming as strong as Illusion might turn me into someone like him.
But to protect Lunaria, I need to become stronger. I can't be wrong about this.)

$Shadow Neko$
You're awake!
You were just standing there like a dead person so I thought I made some trouble.
Thank goodness!

$Shadow Neko$
But you look much better compared to the state when you didn't meditate yet!!
You look more refreshed than a cat with catnip.

$Shadow Neko$
Ohh! I can sense a difference in the energy from your body!!
Indeed, a great master makes a great disciple! Meow? Myeeeooow!!!
(Shadow Neko runs away from a falling leaf)

$Shadow Neko$
Phew that… scared me...
Anyway, to celebrate the outstanding achievements of my disciple… It must be here somewhere… grrr!!
(Shadow Neko searches the box he was standing on)
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

${user_class}$

*Specialization has been completed.

qstep_change.comment: 6~11 : 전직 후 완료 전에 퀘스트 포기하고 다시 수락한 유저를 위한 처리 조건 2번 브링어의 경우 업데이트 시 바로 적용될 수 있도록 조건에서는 판단함.

journal.title: Shadow Neko's Scroll
journal.contents:
Shadow Neko said he made a new meditation scroll.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)

journal.title: To the Room of Time
journal.contents:
Talk to Lunaria at the Room of Time.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko - Room of Time

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)
(* You can go to the Room of Time by talking to Shadow Neko.)
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Lunaria at the Room of Time.

journal.title: Encounter with Illusion
journal.contents:
Illusion was waiting for you at the end of the Room of Time. Try talking to him.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko - Room of Time(Illusion)

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)
(* You can go to the Room of Time by talking to Shadow Neko.)

journal.title: Fighting Yourself
journal.contents:
You have encountered Illusion at the end of the Room of Time. You have to win him.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko - Room of Time(Illusion)

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)
(* You can go to the Room of Time by talking to Shadow Neko.)

journal.title: Talk to Illusion
journal.contents:
You have defeated Illusion. Listen to what he has to say.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko - Room of Time(Illusion)

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)
(* You can go to the Room of Time by talking to Shadow Neko.)

journal.title: To Become Stronger
journal.contents:
Talk to Lunaria at the Selection Room.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko - Selection Room(Lunaria)

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)
(* You can go to the Selection Room by talking to Shadow Neko.)
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Lunaria at the Selection Room.

journal.title: Ability Test
journal.contents:
You have to try out the new job and select the job you want to specialize into.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko - Selection Room(Lunaria)

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)
(* You can go to the Selection Room by talking to Shadow Neko.)
journal.todo_msg: Select the job you want to try and specialize into.

journal.title: A Choice
journal.contents:
You have tried out a new job. Now you have to choose which job you want to specialize into

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko - Selection Room(Lunaria)

(* You cannot take a Specialization Quest in a party.)
(* You can go to the Selection Room by talking to Shadow Neko.)
journal.todo_msg: Job trial completed! Now select the job you want to specialize into.

journal.title: Same But Different
journal.contents:
You have specialized into {user_class}. Talk to Shadow Neko and get rewards.

Calderock Village - Shadow Neko
journal.todo_msg: Specialization completed! Talk to Shadow Neko.
